data.actual_result: The overlay says "Incoming call..." despite the call being outgoing
data.expected_result: The overlay says "Outgoing call.." or doesn't display anything at all
data.short_description: Initiating a call shows "Incoming Call..." in the overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game and ensure the overlay is running - Start a DM call from the overlay and quickly close the overlay or leave the app running in the background, start a dm call then quickly tab back into the overlay
